text_block_list.text: Is Uva not to your liking?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Huh?! N-No, it's very… deli… sicious…? More importantly, um…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ah, that's right. Let us settle the matter at hand. Please, raise your head and follow me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: I will be frank with you. Ardan-san, despite her fragile constitution, is an unmistakable prodigy of the Mejiro family— one of whom we are deeply proud of.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Without wasting even a second in her pursuit of excellence, she expends patience and perseverance for the sake of reaching her ideals.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …And, she's very kind. When I, too, was sickly as a child, she taught me the basics of dancing.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …Huh? Your teacher… was… Ardan-san?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Indeed. She taught me that dance is a good foundation to heighten your awareness of how your body's muscles are moving.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: As an Umamusume of the Mejiro family, she was a respected older sister figure from whom I received instruction.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Is… that… so…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …Ah, ahaha… She's incredible. I knew it— she's really… special… isn't she?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Pray tell, why do you hang your head, Chiyono O-san?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …Uh, that's because… I'm just "ordinary," you see, so… It feels like I'm on a totally different planet from "special" Umamusume…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Even if you were to believe that, Ardan-san chose you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: She thinks of you alone as her special date.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: (She thinks I'm… special…?)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: There is a saying in the Mejiro family that even a sole event at the academy is enough to fuel the fire in our hearts.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: For my Dorowa date, I'd chosen a suitable partner who would allow me the best opportunity to grow.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: I'm sure Ardan-san did the same. Considering how much of a time commitment it is, I'm certain she carefully deliberated on who she thought to be a worthy date.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: She would never take your hand with half-hearted feelings.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …But I'm—
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: If, despite all of that, you still wish to seek for the reason you believe yourself to be "ordinary", then no matter. Please, feel free.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: However, since Ardan-san has already found a reason to believe you "special", it may be a tad too late for that, no?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Besides, don't you think Ardan-san already treats you as "special"?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …No, Ardan-san…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ardan-san never once… dismissed my lofty goal of winning Best Date.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Indeed. Because if it's with you, she believes it to be possible.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Even though she saw how I couldn't dance, she even went on to say that you and Teio would be our rivals.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I'm sure Ardan-san believed your strength was equal to, or even greater than that of ours.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
…Oh, Ardan-san…! 
…Sorry, I have to go!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Good day to you, Chiyono O-san. 
…And with that…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Teio-san, just why are you hiding? I must say that I'm not pleased by your peeking.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Man… I was just thinking, 'you and I really are alike!'… Chiyono O's surprisingly got a lotta fight in her, huh?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: No matter how many times she falls down, she always gets right back on her feet. And when that happens, she starts plannin' her next move.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: …Indeed. Who on earth could think of a girl like that as mediocre? That in itself is her very talent.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: When she shows that side of her, it makes you start thinking, "I'm not gonna lose either!" huh?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Plus, if more awesome rivals like Chiyono-o show up, our dance'll be even more lit!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Since she's granted us such an opportunity for challenge, then we too must rise to the occasion.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: For it is the presence of rivals that make us stronger.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: For real! Plus, I wouldn't be satisfied with just taking first place. Let's make history with a record-breaking dance, McQueen!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Hah… hah… gh, hah…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (… Ardan-san… just what makes you believe in my strength?)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (Is… the answer I've finally reached… the same as yours? I'm just a regular, ordinary Umamusume, but… even, even so…!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Ardan-san! I… 
I—!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
